channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Alexander Wilson (astronomer)
item.description: Alexander Wilson (1714 â€“ 16 October 1786) was a Scottish surgeon, type-founder, astronomer, mathematician and meteorologist. He was the first scientist to use kites in meteorological investigations. He was the first Regius Professor of Practical Astronomy at the University of Glasgow.
